name: tool/get_user_name/spec
cache: {"name": "get_user_name", "description": "Get the user's name. Call this whenever you need to know the name of the user.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {}, "additionalProperties": false}}

name: messages_to_query

Call this whenever you need to know the name of the user.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {}, "additionalProperties": false}}}]}}
